snippet: The novelist Neil Gaiman, who turned his novelette “The Truth Is a Cave in the Black Mountains” into a performance, is bringing the show to the United States.
abstract: Novelist Neil Gaiman, who turned his novelette The Truth Is a Cave in the Black Mountain into a multimedia performance, is bringing the show to the United States in summer 2014.
lead_paragraph: The novelist Neil Gaiman, who turned his novelette “The Truth Is a Cave in the Black Mountains” into a performance, is bringing the show to the United States.

headline.print_headline: Neil Gaiman to Perform ‘Black Mountains’ in U.S.
